analysis.description:
ProjectToken.refundTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-Token(_token).transfer(_refund,_value) (/unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol)
Pausable.setEndBlock.block (local variable @ /unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol#221) shadows built-in symbol "block"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol#274-276:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
ERC20.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol#7-8) should be declared external
Token.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol#98-101) should be declared external
Token.allowance (/unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol#102-108) should be declared external
ERC20.allowance (/unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol#8-10) should be declared external
MintInterface.mint (/unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol#112-115) should be declared external
ProjectToken.mint (/unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol#254-265) should be declared external
Owned.changeOwner (/unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol#137-139) should be declared external
Minted.addMinter (/unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol#171-178) should be declared external
Minted.removeMinter (/unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol#185-189) should be declared external
Minted.endMinting (/unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol#197-198) should be declared external
Pausable.setEndBlock (/unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol#221-222) should be declared external
ProjectToken.approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol#266-277) should be declared external
ProjectToken.refundTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol) should be declared external

Low level call in ProjectToken.approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol#266-277):
	-! _spender.call(bytes4(bytes32(sha3()(receiveApproval(address,uint256,address)))),msg.sender,_value,this) /unique_chucks/2/0xf04a8ac553fcedb5ba99a64799155826c136b0be.sol#274-276
